alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Herkimer County through 500 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Boonville to near Clinton to Norwich. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ilion and Frankfort around 435 PM EDT. Herkimer and Mohawk around 440 PM EDT. Newport and Middleville around 445 PM EDT. Little Falls around 450 PM EDT. Dolgeville around 500 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Ingham Mills, Spinnerville, Cedar Lake, Farrel Corner, Countryman, South Ilion, Kelhi Corners, Chepachet, Shedd Corners and Old City. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 29A and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
